info.name: Seller API Collection
info.description:
# Introduction
Mobile and Web API's for Seller app

# Overview
Include every request from the system

# Authentication
Apart from Login ang Singup, ther api's use Token based authentication

# Error Codes
200 - Success response
201 - Created
204 - No content
400 - Bad request
404 - Object not found
500 - Internal server error

item.name: Eater Mobile
item.description: Contains the mobile endpoints for the Eater user.

request.description:
Endpoint for signing a "eater" user up to the Seller system.

Required fields are:

- name
- email
- password

Required fields are:

- name
- email
- password

Endpoint for logging in an "eater" user into to the Seller system.

Required fields are:

- email
- password

Required fields are:

- email
- password

Endpoint for changing a password for an "eater" user in the Seller system.

Required fields are:
- old_password
- password

Endpoint for forgot a password for an "eater" user in the Seller system.

Required fields are:
- email
Endpoint for logging out an "eater" user from the Seller system.
Endpoint for deleting an "eater" user from the Seller system.
Endpoint for eater profile details
Endpoint for updating eater profile details
Endpoint for eater general settings

Endpoint for retrieving near by vendors
Required query params:
- point - lng, lat (ex: point=78.48,17.32)
- ordering (distance, highestrating, lowestrating, highesttotalratings, lowestlessratings)
- filter 
--	favourite (true/false)
--	cuisines (1,2)
--	dietary (2,3)
--	cashless (true/false)
--	offer (true/false)
--	rating (3,5)
Endpoint retrievning a vendor details
Endpoint for retrieving all vendor dishes

Endpoint for fetching all favourite vendors for a respective eater

Required query paramrs:
- favourite=true
Endpoint for favourite a vendor.
Endpoint for unfavourite a vendor.

Endpoint for retrieving list of active dishes for an eater.

Default ordering: special

Endpoint for retrieving all dietary information

default ordering: name

Endpoint for retrieving all Cuisines

default ordering: name

Endpoint for retrieving all Allergens

default ordering: name

Endpoint for retrieving list of purchases for a eater.

Default ordering: created_at

Endpoint for retrieving list of purchases for a eater.

Default ordering: created_at

Endpoint for retrieving list of purchases for a eater.

Default ordering: created_at

Endpoint for retrieving list of purchases for a eater.

Default ordering: created_at

Endpoint for posting a review for a particular purchase by an eater

Required fields:
- purchase* (purchase ID - int)
- price* (range 1 to 5 - int)
- quality* (range 1 to 5 - int)
- accuracy* (range 1 to 5 - int)
- recommended* (range 1 to 5 - int) 
- text

Endpoint for posting a review for a particular purchase by an eater

Required fields:

- price* (range 1 to 5 - int)
- quality* (range 1 to 5 - int)

- token
- uuid
- type (apns/gcm)
